venue.name: Horse Hill Nature Preserve, just past

item.description:
Easy Hike & Picnic

Sunday Sept. 18th. 11 am. to 2 pm.

Horse Hill Nature Preserve

184 Amherst rd.

Merrimack NH. 03054

www.hhno.org. 

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

THIS WILL BE A RAINY DAY HIKE ONLY. IF IT RAINS.

BYOD & YOUR OWN FOOD.

TRASH MUST BE TAKEN WITH YOU.

 

 Steve O1b. wrote:

         Please join me, my friends for what I hope is a pleasant day for hiking. Bring the dogs, kids and your friends. If it does rain? It will be a shorter hike and no picnic. But, as I said. This will be a pleasant day for and easy 2 1/2 hour hike. We will be stopping and smell what's left of the roses. This preserve is an area of 563 acres wooded and wetlands. There is plenty of parking and well marked trails. The trails loop around to make for an interesting hike. I plan to stop along the trail and have our picnic. From there. we can push off for a longer hike, or head on back. We will see how the weather is and how well feel. But, this is an easy safe setting. Where you can come and go at anytime. check out the web site and download your trail map. If you wish?

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Easy Hike & Picnic
